name: Electrical Engineering
description: Previously belonging to the College of Engineering and Technology, N.C.E. Bengal, Electrical Engineering is one of the oldest departments of Jadavpur University being established in the year 1906. Over the years it has grown into a department of national repute and importance.  All the time, during the past 40 years, the Department is contributing significantly in the relevant fields through the works of its teachers, research scholars, and in the professional fields by the students passing out. The Department has revamped and replenished its curriculum and course structure to keep pace with the present-day needs of the subjects, associated industries, and the country at large; The Department is basically centered around six different sectional laboratories which play the role of nuclei.
